ayahs.indonesian: Apabila telah datang pertolongan Allah dan kemenangan,
ayahs.english: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,

ayahs.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
ayahs.transliteration: Waraayta alnnasa yadkhuloona fee deeni Allahi afwaja
ayahs.indonesian: dan engkau melihat manusia berbondong-bondong masuk agama Allah,
ayahs.english: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,

ayahs.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
ayahs.transliteration: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika waistaghfirhu innahu kana tawwaba
ayahs.indonesian: maka bertasbihlah dengan memuji Tuhanmu dan mohonlah ampun kepada-Nya. Sungguh, Dia Maha Penerima tobat.
ayahs.english: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.
